name: SwitchBoard
description: Cost-optimize AI agent operations by routing tasks to appropriate models based on complexity
author: digitalhustla

required.name: OPENROUTER_API_KEY
required.description: OpenRouter API key for model routing and sub-agent spawning (get at openrouter.ai/keys)

privacy_notes: Some models listed in this skill (e.g., Aurora Alpha, Free Router) may log prompts and completions for provider training or improvement.
Do not route sensitive data (API keys, passwords, private PII) through free or unmoderated models.
Review the model privacy policies at openrouter.ai/docs before using.

files.name: SKILL.md
files.description: OpenClaw skill definition with model tiers, decision algorithm, and integration guide

children.name: openrouter-models.md
children.description: Curated OpenRouter model reference by tier

children.name: openrouter-models.json
children.description: Full OpenRouter model catalog snapshot (340+ models)
